custom_date: SELECT timestamp_value FROM custom_date WHERE date_name = 'CUSTOM_DATE'

mb_money.mb_money_campaign_details: SELECT * FROM campaign_configuration WHERE campaign_id IN (SELECT MAX(campaign_id) FROM campaign_configuration WHERE name = ? GROUP BY campaign_id)
mb_money.update_mb_money_campaign: UPDATE campaign_configuration SET effective_date = ?, expiration_date = ? WHERE campaign_id = ?
mb_money.mb_money_exclusions: SELECT * FROM campaign_exclusion WHERE campaign_id IN (SELECT MAX(campaign_id) FROM campaign_configuration WHERE name = ? GROUP BY campaign_id)
mb_money.mb_money_attributes: SELECT * FROM campaign_attribute WHERE campaign_id IN (SELECT MAX(campaign_id) FROM campaign_configuration WHERE name = ? GROUP BY campaign_id)
mb_money.insert_user_reward_card: insert into user_gift_reward_card (USER_ID, CARD_NUMBER, MASKED_CARD, CARD_GUID, TOTAL_AMOUNT, EFFECTIVE_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE, CARD_TYPE, CARD_STATUS, CREATED, LAST_MODIFIED, SITE_ID) VALUES (?,'?', '?', '?', ?, '?', '?', '?', '?', CURRENT TIMESTAMP, CURRENT TIMESTAMP, ?)
insert_campaign_configuration:
Insert into CAMPAIGN_CONFIGURATION(CAMPAIGN_ID, CAMPAIGN_CODE, NAME, PARENT_ID, CAMPAIGN_DESCRIPTION, CAMPAIGN_DISCLAIMER, APPLICATION_NAME, EXCLUSIONS, EFFECTIVE_DATE, EXPIRATION_DATE, CREATED, LAST_MODIFIED) values ((select NVL(max(campaign_id),0)+1 from campaign_configuration), 'MMON', 'MMoney', null, 'mMoney', 'TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF MACYS MONEY REWARD CARDS
A Macy''s Money Reward Card may be used to purchase merchandise and in store services at any Macy''s store and online at macys.com (U.S. only). It may not be redeemed for cash, used to purchase Macy''s gift cards or applied as payment or credit to your credit card account. When you make a purchase with a Macy''s Money Reward Card, your receipt will show any remaining balance. Please safeguard it. Because no proof of purchase receipt is provided with it, it is not replaceable if lost or stolen. The bearer is responsible for its loss or theft. To check the balance of a card, see a Sales Associate. A Macy''s Money Reward Card is required for all sales and inquiries. If a purchase used to accumulate Macy''s Money is returned, Macy''s reserves the right to void the Macy''s Money Reward Card or reduce the corresponding value. Online Macy''s Reward cards only available until 11:59 pm EST on 12/23/15.
For more information, go to macys.com/macysmoney
For customer service, call 1-800-511-2752

HOW IT WORKS: For each online or in-store transaction of $50 or more you make from December 11-December 16, 2015, we''ll give you a $10 (spend $50-$74.99), $15 (spend $75-$99.99), $20 (spend $100-$149.99), $30 (spend $150-$199.99) or $40 (spend $200 or more) Macy''s Money Reward Card at the register or online. EXCLUDES THE FOLLOWING PURCHASES: Gift cards, e-gifts, international orders, online backorders, pre-sale items, services & fees, sales tax, Macybed, phone orders, leased depts., Espot, restaurants. USE YOUR MACY''S MONEY REWARD CARD online or in-store from December 18-December 23. promotional_products_with_promo_code: Select Distinct (ps.PROD_ID), pc.PROMOTION_CODE From PROMOTION p LEFT OUTER JOIN PROMO_CODE pc ON p.PROMOTION_ID=pc.PROMOTION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PROMOTION_TRIGGER p_trigger ON pc.PROMOTION_ID=p_trigger.PROMOTION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PROMO_ATTR_VAL pav ON p_trigger.PROMOTION_ID=pav.PROMOTION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PL_PRODUCT_PROMOTIONS ps ON pav.PROMOTION_ID=ps.PROMOTION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT pr ON ps.PROD_ID = pr.PROD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UPC u ON pr.PROD_ID=u.PROD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN UNARY_PRD_ATTR_VAL upva ON u.PROD_ID=upva.PROD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN AVAILABILITY a ON u.UPC_ID=a.UPC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PRICE price ON u.UPC_ID=price.UPC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PRICE_EVENT p_event ON price.UPC_ID=p_event.UPC_ID WHERE u.display_stat_code=1 and a.AVAILABLE='Y' and a.INV_STATUS_CODE='AVAILABLE' and pr.display_stat_code=1 and pav.ATTR_NAME = 'BADGE_TEXT' and upva.ATTR_NAME = 'INTL_SUPPRESS_PRODUCT' and upva.ATTR_VALUE = 'N' and ps.PROD_ID!=0 and p.PROMO_TYPE in ('Dollar Off Order','Percent Off Order','Free Shipping','Promotional Pricing','Tiered Pricing','Tiered Subtotal Discount') and p.promotion_exp_date >= ? and p.promotion_eff_date <= ? and pr.product_eff_date <= ? and pr.product_exp_date >= ? order by ps.PROD_ID fetch first 10 rows only
